name: SenseLess (Smorg)
description:
A senseless being finds himself in a house with no exit. With him, he has his sense pedestal. It allows him to have senses again, but with a limitation. He can only have at a time. Help him explore the house, lick it all, and find the limited amount of things to interact with. 

Use Q and E to change sense. Some items are intractable, press space with the right sense selected to interact with them. Press escape to end the game.

This game was created Smorg and Magicanz, and this is our first time competing in a game jam, which may explain the lack of content. However, we will continue with this concept further, so stay tuned!
